title: doc/effective_go: {{html .}} unexplained in Effective Go's web server example
body:
by **ralph.corderoy**: 
http://golang.org/doc/effective_go.html#web_server says "The snippet {{urlquery .}}
says to process the data with the function urlquery, which sanitizes the query string
for safe display on the web page."

The template also contains a similar "{{html .}}" that could be explained in
the same sentence but isn't explained at all leaving the reader to follow the given link
to the full text/template documentation.  With a slight tweak to the text both could be
explained, leaving nothing in the template unexplained.
